const getLastMonthData=()=>{let lastYear=currentYear;let lastMonth=currentMonth-1;if(lastMonth===0){lastYear=currentYear-1;lastMonth=12;}return allData.find(row=>row.年份===lastYear&&row.月份===lastMonth);};// 获取去年同月数据
